Package eddy.lang.net

Provides classes to share Eddy policies over a network.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Agent
    Describes a mapping between a policy and the parties with whom data is shared.
    Agent.Party
    Describes a data relationship with another party.
    AgentApp
    Provides a graphic user interface to interact with an Agent.
    AgentClient
    Provides an HTTP client for pulling a policy from a policy server.
    AgentReader
    Reads an Agent from a file, including their Policy.
    AgentServer
    Provides an HTTP server for pushing a policy to a policy reader.
    ServiceMap
    Provides a mapping between terminology from two agents.
    ServiceMapReader
    Reads a service map that aligns terminology between two Policy objects.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Agent.Party.Direction
    Describes the direction of the data relationship.

Package eddy.lang.net Description

Provides classes to share Eddy policies over a network.
